channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Live: WA World Athletics Championships
channel.desc: Day 2 of the World Athletics Championships begins with the women's marathon, which for the first time starts and finishes in the National Stadium in Tokyo. Elsewhere, Great Britain's Josh Kerr begins the defence of his 1500m world title in the heats, and the women's sprint hurdlers are also in action in qualifying.
